body.p: The following are examples of transactions that are disclosed if they are with a related party:

li.p: purchases or sales of goods (finished or unfinished);
purchases or sales of property and other assets;
transfers under finance arrangements (including loans and equity contributions in cash or in kind);
commitments to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised); and
settlement of liabilities on behalf of the entity or by the entity on behalf of that related party.
